nodes.bodyText: Btw: we should (as always) add tests... The test should verify that by default CreateTime is set and that a user can overwrite the config.
Done, and fixed some broken unit tests. I don't see the Jenkins tests being run on this PR but I ran locally and they're all passing now
Seems we should test this for all 3 types of topics?
Ack, added test for each internal topic type
